Package cmput301.f13t01.createyourownadventure

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    ChoiceListListener
    The ChoiceListListener interface is an interface that must be implemented by any activity using a ChoiceListFragment.
    LibraryManager
    This interface is designed to interact with stored stories.
    Media<T>
    The Media interface is an interface which must be implemented by any classes that will be used as media types inside a Fragment.
    StoryFragmentListListener
    The StoryFragmentListListener interface is an interface that must be implemented by any activity using a StoryFragmentListFragment.
    Viewable  
  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    Choice
    This is a simple object that will contain the information related to a particular choice, which will allow the transition from one fragment to another while reading.
    ChoiceListAdapter
    The ChoiceListAdapter class is the ArrayAdapter for the ChoiceList Fragment.
    ChoiceListFragment  
    ChoiceMap
    This class contains all methods associated with selecting adding, editing or removing the choice linkages for a given story.
    EditFragment  
    EditFragmentActivity  
    EditFragmentContentActivity  
    EditFragmentInfoActivity  
    EditStoryActivity  
    ESManager
    This class is designed to interact with stored stories on ElasticSearch.
    FragmentListAdapter
    The FragmentListAdapter class is the ArrayAdapter for the FragmentList Fragment.
    GlobalManager
    The GlobalManager class is a class used to hold global story access managers.
    History
    An instance of this class exists when a story is created, keeping track of which fragment was last viewed in read mode by a user.
    Image
    Class for Image type Media.
    InfoFragment  
    JsonConverter  
    LocalManager
    This class is designed to maintain all of the stories that are stored locally on the user's device.
    MainActivity
    sets up and handles main screen ui that allows user to display stories saved on device, select a story to read from beginning, select a story to read from last history, select a story to edit a story, select a story to delete, browse for online stories, and create a new story
    MediaInteractionManager
    Class for managing interaction and interaction options with Media.
    PreviewFragment  
    ReadFragmentActivity
    ReadFragmentActivity, the activity called for reading any story fragment.
    ReadFragmentView
    The view for the ReadFragmentActivity.
    ReadStoryManager
    ReadStoryManager is the connection between various activities and a story.
    Searcher  
    Sound
    Class for Sound type Media.
    Story
    Story object, basic functional unit for a story.
    StoryFragment
    StoryFragment object, essentially a single page for a story.
    StoryFragmentInfo
    StoryFragmentInfo class, used to represent StoryFragments in a list.
    StoryFragmentList
    FragmentList, holds all Fragment objects and gives each a unique ID.
    StoryFragmentListFragment  
    StoryInfo
    StoryInfo class.
    StoryInfoListAdapter
    The StoryInfoListAdapter class is the ArrayAdapter for the StoryInfo list.
    Text
    Class for Text type Media.
    Video
    Class for Video type Media.
  • Enum Summary 
    Enum Description
    MediaType
